title: Language Learning Design Integrating AI and Robotics: A Microlearning-Based Integrated Approach (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language learning experience and fundamental digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: Emphasis on personalized language learning experiences using AI chatbots and educational robots in smartphone-based environments, with integrated assessment of physical, socio-emotional, and cognitive learning outcomes

learning_goals: Self-diagnose grammatical errors with over 80% accuracy using AI-based language analysis tools
Apply ten situational language expressions to real-world scenarios through robot simulation dialogues

In a robot programming task organized in teams of three, learners will complete a three-stage development process (planning-implementation-testing) using collaboration tools (Slack, GitHub, etc.), and achieve 4 or higher (on a 5-point scale) in four out of five socioemotional competency items (communication, conflict management, responsibility) through peer evaluation and self-reflection reports.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
